div.p: As some of you have discovered, entering LARGE test cases is nearly impossible in Unix terminals. (I was unaware of this limit and hadn't encountered this problem in previous editions of the course.) So you must either give up on large test cases or implement the test administrator(s).

If you are interested in "purchasing" such a test administrator from Richard, please drop him a line. He will then place a test administrator (for Solaris) into your SVN directory (where we expected the administrator). The cost is 5 POINTS.
